Label.en: As I’m sure you know, the Place Du Chatelet is bang in the centre of Paris, just north of the Ile de la Cite
Label.fr: As I’m sure you know, the Place Du Chatelet is bang in the centre of Paris, just north of the Ile de la Cite
Label.es: As I’m sure you know, the Place Du Chatelet is bang in the centre of Paris, just north of the Ile de la Cite

Label.en: But, in fact, it used to be right at the north edge!
Label.fr: But, in fact, it used to be right at the north edge!
Label.es: But, in fact, it used to be right at the north edge!

Label.en: The ‘chatelet’ it gets its name from was the north gate.
Label.fr: The ‘chatelet’ it gets its name from was the north gate.
Label.es: The ‘chatelet’ it gets its name from was the north gate.

Label.en: Unlike now, parisians in the 9th century had the reasonably bothersome issue of frequent raids from vikings from the north.
Label.fr: Unlike now, parisians in the 9th century had the reasonably bothersome issue of frequent raids from vikings from the north.
Label.es: Unlike now, parisians in the 9th century had the reasonably bothersome issue of frequent raids from vikings from the north.

Label.en: The city was sacked at least four times between 860-890.
Label.fr: The city was sacked at least four times between 860-890.
Label.es: The city was sacked at least four times between 860-890.

Label.en: To deter the bothersome vikings, Charles the bald refurbished fortifications at the north gate.
Label.fr: To deter the bothersome vikings, Charles the bald refurbished fortifications at the north gate.
Label.es: To deter the bothersome vikings, Charles the bald refurbished fortifications at the north gate.

Label.en: It seems to have worked, too! The Franks won in the 890 siege of paris!
Label.fr: It seems to have worked, too! The Franks won in the 890 siege of paris!
Label.es: It seems to have worked, too! The Franks won in the 890 siege of paris!

Label.en: Charles the fat sent the vikings north up the river instead to sack the revolting Burgundians. Serves them right.
Label.fr: Charles the fat sent the vikings north up the river instead to sack the revolting Burgundians. Serves them right.
